H0.text: who has the most rushing yards in a super bowl. Emmitt Smith

H1.text: who has the most rushing yards in a super bowl. Marcus Allen

H2.text: who has the most rushing yards in a super bowl. Thurman Thomas

H3.text: who has the most rushing yards in a super bowl. Timmy Smith

A4.text: Emmitt Smith rushed for 170 yards in Super Bowl XXV, which is the record for the most rushing yards in a single Super Bowl.

A5.text: Marcus Allen's best rushing performance in a Super Bowl was 124 yards in Super Bowl XLIII, far below the record.

A6.text: Thurman Thomas never rushed for more than 78 yards in any Super Bowl, which is well below the record for the most rushing yards.

A7.text: Timmy Smith's best rushing performance in a Super Bowl was only 18 yards in Super Bowl XXII, not a record.
